抄.definition: to make a copy; to plagiarize; to search and seize; to raid; to grab; to go off with; to take a shortcut; to make a turning move; to fold one's arms

抄家.definition: to search a house and confiscate possessions

抄小路.definition: to take the back roads; to take the side streets; to take the small paths

抄底.definition: (finance) to snap up undervalued stocks; bargain-hunting; bottom-fishing

抄後路.definition: to outflank and attack from the rear

抄手.definition: to fold one's arms; copyist; (dialect) wonton

抄襲.definition: to plagiarize; to copy; to attack the flank or rear of an enemy

抄近兒.definition: erhua variant of 抄近[chao1 jin4]

抄送.definition: to make a copy (and send it to someone); Cc (for email); Carbon Copy (for email)

抄靶子.definition: (dialect) to do a body search; to frisk
